author: cschoett
msg: Adding a new sample which demonstrates 1) Controls lifecycle events 2) Adding a service provider to a ControlContainerContainer context. The sample is a page flow which contains a control, that control has its own nested control. A user is able to invoke page flow methods from a jsp and get back the list of control lifecycle events which occured for that invocation. The events are logged using the LifecycleEventRecorderService from each control.
